channel.title: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?
channel.description:
I've been possessor atleast 6 times and every time i try to possess someone it says something like 'you failed to possess name[number]' then they die and I'm wondering why this happens?
I read the wiki page for possessor and i don't see anything indicating why it fails.

item.title: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?
item.dc:creator: Satan
item.description:
ok thnx ill keep that in mind when im possessor again

Read full topic
item.source: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?

item.title: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
I saw possessor game that won from mainly using three clever used possessing against cult and revived prince.

He emerged victorious.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?

item.title: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
Well, from personal experience, I rarely ever choose to jump bodies with Possessor.
So, I’m not too sure if it’s so difficult now.
However, yes, there are variables which stop you jumping.

Night Immunity, Healing, Imprisonment (Of target), Same night death and more.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?

item.title: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.source: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?

item.title: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?
item.dc:creator: Satan
item.description:
well its definitely me that kills them every time because my death note appears and they do die so is there another factor or is this not whats meant to happen?

Read full topic
item.source: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?

item.title: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
If the person you are attacking is also attacked by someone else then the possession fails. If the person survived your attack then the possession also fails.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it rare to jump bodies with possessor?
